title: New Document Link Formula Functions (covering all of our field types)
Automatically generated Well and Site numbers
Fixed issue where filter fields on Data Table Selector were not being honoured.
Fixed default sorting on the new-style grids.  They new sort on first column like the used to.
Fixed bug where a Site's Well List would fail to load if there was an inactive field specified in the Well's identifying fields.
New "Is Actual", "AFE Gross Actuals" and "AFE Net Actuals" columns added to Monthly Project Capital report type.
Made Enersight timeout configurable to better handle integration with larger projects
Button to copy details from linked Wells, Sites and Jobs onto an AFE
AFE Number field on Dashboard now displayed as "AFE Number" instead of "Value"
Fixed issue where bulk update of document flags from the browse screen could leave document locked
Fixed issue where import from Enersight would fail when project referenced capital class contained upper-case characters (i.e. unallocatedProvision, ownerCosts, ï¿½)
Fixed issue where Document Sync would fail on non-AFE custom columns.
Fixed issue where removing an account from the system would fail if it was referrenced by a hidden (according to view rights) AFE.
Added drag-and-drop mode that automatically moves all related activities that aren't assigned a resource.
Fixed issues where an error in a workflow task rule would cause the rule to become uneditable.
